website_summaries.verdict: This sleek manual trash compactor works well for paper and food waste.
pros: The stainless steel exterior suits most kitchens well
Has an 8-gallon capacity, or up to 24 gallons of crushed garbage
Features a built-in odor filter that works well
cons: Not strong enough to crush cans or plastic

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thing a month and the cover is already broken!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom W.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic pieces are not sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.text: It fell apart after 1 month. Plastic pieces are not sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: nonamemoe1

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was genius because I don’t have recycling where I live so compacting my trash is a great alternative. This is not an electric compactor—it works on human power. The third time I pressed down to compact the contents, the whole assembly fell apart!! I am now waiting for the manufacturer to replace the product which I have to say is hugely overrated.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Crushes trash like trash. Wouldn't recommended to an enemy
customer_reviews.text: Hard to put bag in. Crushes trash like trash. Wouldn't recommended to an enemy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for most standard kitchen trash.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for non recycle trash. Not designed to crush cans, bottles or even plastic. I'm very happy with it. We have regular trash, paper and cardboard as well as glass and plastic for recycle. I have to put out 3 trash cans on Fridays. I only have to empty this can once a week and I use standard trash bags. This works perfect for my situation. I've had it several months now, compact 2 to 3 times a week and nothing has broken. Most of the can is metal, except for the compacting handle and bag clips. Again, don't try and compact glass, cans or plastic bottles and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: UnclePV

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but the bags could be a bit more stronger, it started to rip
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Nice garbage can, but only works well with Joseph Joseph bags.
customer_reviews.text: I like this can, it is attractive as far as garbage cans go. My only issue thus far is that the compactor feature works well with the bags provided, store purchased bags don't want to stay in the bag attachment and come loose from the connector. So, if you don't mind buying the bags that are compatible with the can, the can will work very well. I have to emphasize again that store purchased bags (Store or named brand, we've tried both) will not work with this can.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: I am not a 100 percent satisfied as it doesnot crush like I thought it would ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not a 100 percent satisfied as it doesnot crush like I thought it would and I do have bag issues staying in place
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than 60 days
customer_reviews.text: Thought This was genius idea. Until my return window ran out and the product broke and was no longer usable after 60 days. Don’t buy. Not worth the aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: The concept is great but the compacting handle broke within the first month
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great but the compacting handle broke within the first month. The can construction is well designed but the getting customer service to replace the handle has been a problem. Will update this when the or of the part is received.
customer_reviews.author: Willard R. Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Well I got in a hurry and ordered hastily...it’s smaller than I thought the compactor is useless...the bags come off, in the one week I’ve had it I’ve taken the entire can to the dumpster 3 times...Father’s Day was heavy trash due to the family gigs each day...I would not buy again I clearly do not recommend this product...I did learn however to research more carefully in the future
customer_reviews.author: Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: ... about 5 months before swapping it for my old garbage cannister. I like the stainless steel look but ...
customer_reviews.text: I used mine for about 5 months before swapping it for my old garbage cannister. I like the stainless steel look but the cannister just doesn't hold much trash even when compacting the garbage. Removing and replacing the bags is a nuisance because you must slide the bag under clips at each corner. I never had a problem with any of the parts breaking or malfunctioning; I just found it easier to do it the old fashion way.
customer_reviews.author: argreen

customer_reviews.title: Bags are horrible. They tear really easy
customer_reviews.text: Bags are horrible. They tear really easy. They’re difficult to load correctly. Trash can is heavy and bulky. Save your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Snowberger

customer_reviews.title: A BIG BIG MISTAKE
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold bag and garbage keeps falling behind bag. VERY POOR DESIGN A BIG WASTE OF MONEY After having this for several months it was THE WORST PURCHASES I ever made on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: A. Porf

customer_reviews.title: For the price - not good at
customer_reviews.text: Not very well built! It already broke and you mind as well push the trash doen woth your hands it doesnt do much. For the price - not good at all
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Bailey

customer_reviews.title: For office
customer_reviews.text: You could not press the garbage the way they show on their video. So it can store only little of garbage and you need to change the garbage bags very often which is not convenience at all. Other than that, they have great and awesome looking, nice stainless steel. Look valuable ! Can be use for office where have not much garbage
customer_reviews.author: ZiFog

customer_reviews.title: Great idea once it’s perfected.
customer_reviews.text: Why I bought this for the really great idea behind this, it was a huge waste of money. I tried and tried to deal with the bag constantly falling off when crushing/compacting the garbage. The next biggest issue is once the trash compactor is full getting the bag out was a huge struggle and every time the “expensive” bags tear completely apart at the pull string. The idea is an amazing idea, it’s just not there yet. I have since purchase an amazing can for a fraction of the cost that gives no frustration. I have one of these for sale for 1/2 off along with the remaining bags I purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia G. Kretz

customer_reviews.title: Mostly ok, sometimes a big pain in the can.
customer_reviews.text: The crushers are plastic and feel flimsy, I don't used more than 30 pounds of force on them, won't crush soda cans. The ears that hold the bag let the bag ends slip out often. The can has no tapper or vacuum break, so the bags are often hard to get out or are stuck in the can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great garbage can.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful garbage can. Worth every penny. I was always the one to put my hand in the garbage to smash it down. Noone in the house would do it besides me. Well now I dont have a problem doing it anymore. Neither does my husband and kids. Awesome garbage can. The only problem in have is that I have to buy the Joseph Joseph trash bags. Regular glads dont work. Still searching for an alternative. But I highly recommend this. I'm even buying my mom on for Christmas because she loves mine so much.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work as described.
customer_reviews.text: Unless you have decent strength, there's NO WAY this will compact your trash down, as it requires YOU to use YOUR force to push down on the garbage. CONTINUOUSLY. The literature and commercial are VERY MISLEADING, as they make it seem like very little is required. I returned this item after complete frustration and disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Huerta

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to compact. I bought this as a Christmas present, family of seven and they go thru allot of trash. My son in law is really the only one that can smash it down. The inside is so narrow that it is not holding as much trash as their other waste can. They said the bags are tearing so they went back to using their other trash bags in this can. It's nice looking and sturdy but has not proved to be worth the money in our case. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Davidsmeier

customer_reviews.title: An utterly ridiculous product
customer_reviews.text: An utterly ridiculous product. I feel so dumb falling for this! It’s good looking... but it’s just a stupid, over-engineered idea! (And that means: it doesn’t actually work very well. No where near worth the incremental hassle of changing out the bags).
customer_reviews.author: Mark Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice aesthetic
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash can compactor. While it is manual it is very easy to use. It has nearly cut the amount of times i have to take out the trash from twice a week to only once a week. The odor control works very well as there is no over powering odors that come from the bin even as the trash builds up. The bin lid is very sturdy and protects from my very large dog who use to get in my old trash can. Overall im very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes you shouldn’t reinvent the wheel
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it at all. Great idea in theory however probably the most irritating item I’ve ever owned not worth the money. Threw it in the dumpster after five days because I feel like donating it would be doing someone a disservice.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Love the size of this trash containers
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of this trash containers, however loading an unloading the trash bags is a real pain! Plus the bags are way too expensive!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth A. Cross

customer_reviews.title: SUPER idea...keep working on it. I’ll buy the next model also.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son and his growing family. The concept was perfect for his needs. I just found out that the first time he used the compressing mechanism, the plastic piece broke. They are using it as a regular trash can and I have to say the appearance is still looking new. I would definitely buy it again if they could rethink the plastic components. THE CONCEPT OF THIS CAN IS SUPER!
customer_reviews.author: robin O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, poor design
customer_reviews.text: We gave this a shot, because we absolutely loved the concept. The follow through when compacting the trash according to instructions was horrible. The bag would fall off every time. We used their bags and our normal bags, it happened with both. At this price point, it needs to work more flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Autumnluvr84

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed with this trash can
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this trash can! The bag is difficult to replace, the mechanism that slowly closes the lid broke the first day. It does come with a 10 year guarantee , but what a hassle I now have to call the company and figure out what they will do for me. I would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: JDH

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work , it doesn’t compact the trash as advertised. The odor filter does nothing. The Joseph Joseph bags don’t stay on whe attempting to “compact “ the trash .The return window should be 6 months so you have time to see what a true waste of money this thing is . Please Amazon stop selling this piece of junk. If I could return this I certainly would do so. Very dissatisfied with this poor functioning item. I would rate it 0 stars if I Could!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Browne

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Product doesn’t work well at all. Trash doesn’t stay compacted. I am very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: WG_2006

customer_reviews.title: A waste of $$$
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice-looking piece of junk! The idea is good as is the design but the compacting only "works" if the trash is all soft, easily-compacted material...and our trash usually is not! Spend the extra money and purchase an electric compactor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back!!
customer_reviews.text: A $20 trash can works so much better than this one. The hinges break and cannot be fixed. If they want to charge this much money, you would think all the parts would last. DO NOT BUY!!! They should return all our money.
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: This is a pain in the rear
customer_reviews.text: I hate having to fight with a trash can just to put a new liner in, or take the old one out. I would never buy this again. There are four spots where the liner has to slide into and out of that takes tooooo long versus a typical trash liner.
customer_reviews.author: Elmer E. Gray

customer_reviews.title: and once it gets compacted (which you gotta be strong to compact the garbage to the point to where it really saves space) ...
customer_reviews.text: Bags constantly slide out of the holder, and once it gets compacted (which you gotta be strong to compact the garbage to the point to where it really saves space) the bag itself gets really heavy to pull out and dump.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Pahukoa

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get it to work!
customer_reviews.text: No instructions and have no idea to get bags to work. Also thought I was buying big bags and tiny one comes in. Went to YouTube but all it shows is an advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Cmanley

customer_reviews.title: Was almost satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: The compacting handle fell apart and continues to. We lost the freshener cover the first couple of days. I felt I got to go a little longer before needing to empty. Bags are difficult to remove and gets annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Re consider this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bags do not work, does not compact, breaks easily. Bags are near impossible to fit correctly, fall off constantly
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Bags are expensive and not worth the $22+.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this trash can and have been using it for about a month. I really like the thought of it but after using it for a month, I would not purchase this again. Mostly because of the bags. They are a hassle to deal with. They tear easily and are hard to pull out of the trash can once it is full.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great idea - poor execution
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately with all parts being plastic I can see where the other reviews complain about the product breaking. My biggest issue was with installing the liners as it was a really difficult task that required many adjustments as you compacted the trash - it kinda takes away from the whole no need to use your hands pitch they are going for
customer_reviews.author: Sue Donym

customer_reviews.title: Replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: The plastic parts that make this work don't stay in place and they get lost.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: To difficult to operate
customer_reviews.text: Its to hard to manually compact the trash. i spent what $160? And i have to risk a back injury to compact the trash. It looks crazy sleek tho
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but love it
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but seems built to last and the compactor function is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Trash can that turns your money into trash
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have read all the reviews first! This trash can is the fastest way to turn your money into trash. Very poor design, looks cool, but performs horribly.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: It works, it compacts trash
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, quality. Get the Joseph and Joseph bags, they are stronger and work better.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D.

customer_reviews.title: Not practical
customer_reviews.text: The theory is sound, but it's not practical as this unit does not function as it should as the lining either breaks or comes loose from the lip.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln Flowers

customer_reviews.title: the handle at the hindge broke...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the trash can and the purpose. However the hindge that is part of the handle that compacts the trash and pulls the bag out has broken... so the purpose is no longer functional... now it is just a expensive looking trash can...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money don’t work
customer_reviews.text: This can is a joke it does not compact trash as advertised the bag rips and won’t stay on bag holder I sent this one back ASAP for sure
customer_reviews.author: Scott K. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: It tends to get stuck when you have bottles. They get stuck in the side area and stop from pushing down. But it works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Goss, Thad

customer_reviews.title: Needs work on trash liner holder for compacting trash
customer_reviews.text: The special handle that compacts the trash doesn’t work very well at all because it won’t hold on to the bag that you install.
customer_reviews.author: Rickey Dolph Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product !
customer_reviews.text: This broke after 1 week and the plastic parts just came apart almost every time you push it down .
customer_reviews.author: jeff rickermann

customer_reviews.title: It was absolutely terrible. It didn’t crush anything
customer_reviews.text: Took it to the Goodwil. It was absolutely terrible. It didn’t crush anything, the bag wouldn’t stay in and the bags were also a special order size.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Clark

customer_reviews.title: Like but....
customer_reviews.text: I like the trash can but it did not come with one piece. Guess we will see if they reply or not on that. I see others hate this trashcan after awhle but I still like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Breshears

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This product should be removed from the market. I'm so disappointed! The bags come off when you are trying to compact, which by the way, it doesn't compact anything. It pushes down trash and as soon as you released, it comes back up like you didn't do anything. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: zuzel

customer_reviews.title: I need to return!!!!  May I please have a return postage
customer_reviews.text: This item doesn’t work, and I need to return. Bought it for Valentines Day, and we’re not even using it!! What do I do?! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Lee Morris lll

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Changing bags is easy. Works with regular trash bags very well. Definitely noticed a less full dumpster every week.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hemann

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get bag in just right. If not went you compress trash the bag comes undone . More of a pain. Now the lid slams closed instead of closing slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Make the bags a little cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, I used it for trash, it is very good, but the bags very expensive
customer_reviews.author: mariam eladem

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but if you put any type of plastic containers in your garbage cans it does not compress them (ex - orange jiuice container). The inside piece broke (a plastic piece used to push the garbage down) right after the 30 days. It now sits useless in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: r hunter

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth it! It’s not working like described and now tips over when we open it. We bought in January.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Wysocki

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLY SMALL FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: will not purchase ever again. The side was dented when it arrived. The size is INCREDIBLY SMALL.
customer_reviews.author: LaDonna W

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The bags do not stay on the handles and there is a big gap between the bag and the sides of can allowing for trash to fall through. Nice idea in theory but does not work well in reality.
customer_reviews.author: christie mcnally

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars because it is sturdy and looks beautiful. Does not compact the trash like the video displays.
customer_reviews.author: judi mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Ship totally intact with no problem
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy its durability and it looks looks very nice in my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Walter Dale

customer_reviews.title: It works as described.
customer_reviews.text: I like that I don' have to carry out the trash near as often.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Parker

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Works great but it is best if you use their bags.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive/not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This product does not compact trash very well and is too expensive for its capabilities. The can liners are also expensive and its inconvenient to change them out. It looks like on the exterior but I am returning this to go back to my simple stainless trash container.
customer_reviews.author: W Renee

customer_reviews.title: Really cool trash can
customer_reviews.text: I love my trash can now. It really does save on bags. We went from taking the trash out every day to twice a week. Such a great idea, can't believe nobody thought of it earlier. The bags do come off the holder sometimes, but it is easy to just slide them back on. It is pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: Better off smashing garbage with your hand !!! Does NOT work !! I wish I had NOT thrown the Gigantic Box away that it came in or I would send it back !!!
customer_reviews.author: Bluegrs

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I do not care for this product. Not easy to use. Bags don't get as much use as a normal trash can. Bags rip when you are taking them out. Not happy at all. Worst money ever spent on a trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: So far it works as advertised. I like it very much. I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: BEC

customer_reviews.title: 1 bag lasts a whole week.
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash can, best one we have had so for. Looks great, does not bang against the wall or mar the wall. It is NOT a compactor in the true sense of the word but does compress the trash enough so that 1 bag lasts a household of 2 a full week. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trash can! We are a family of four and I was taking the trash out almost every day. This trash can has cut that down quite a bit. I can go 3 days now. I have tried the Josep Joseph liners and regular 13 gallon drawstring liners and I think the Joseph Joseph work better. I’m not sure why there are bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: M. Prewit

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money! With traditional trash can averaged about 3-4 bags per week, now 1 bag a week! It uses standard trash bags from the store with no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unintelligent waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Unintelligent waste of money. The product took a long time to be delivered. It took several weeks to get here. We packed so much trash in the bag would not come out. The bin had to be washed after we finally pried the destroyed bag out. Skip the compacting and use regular bags. The design is pleasing but The odor blocker did nothing for the smells.
customer_reviews.author: Haystack needle

customer_reviews.title: It's nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice looking..the bags work well.. But I wouldn't spend the money on it again, disappointed on how it works.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE S.

customer_reviews.title: Overall I like the product
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the product. For the price I did expect more. I felt like the crusher part is a little flimsy. I would have wished for it to be less flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bags are easy to install, no odor. Clean lines make it very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Suzan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this compactor! Only wish the inside dimensions were a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Quickly Broke, No Customer Service Call Back
customer_reviews.text: This product is garbage (pun intended). Within a few weeks a push screw spring popped on the compacting arm rendering the unit useless. I emailed Joseph Joseph twice requesting replacement part—either full compacting arm or push screw. To date, I have been ignored. I would think twice before hitting the, “add to cart” on this one...
customer_reviews.author: Irish Dad

customer_reviews.title: Bought two of these and they are both garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Spent over $300 for trashcans because I live in a city that hates trash. Our weekly collected bin is just a smidge larger than a standard kitchen trash bin. So, I saw a video and pulled the trigger. The bags that come with it are the worst. They don’t withstand the compacting feature, coming undone or tearing every time you go to crush the trash. About that.... this doesn’t compact your trash. At all. We even separated cans and bottles and saw no significant difference. It’s awful. It looks pretty, but it’s essentially a $200 single simple human can with crappier bags. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Darcie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's not as advertised. The bags don't stay on that well. It doesn't even come with instructions.
customer_reviews.author: John Glassmire

customer_reviews.title: The lid works
customer_reviews.text: Unless all you're throwing away is newspapers or styrofoam cups. This is just an expensive trash can that can give you a slight cardio workout. Cause you push it down....everything comes right back up. Wal Mart trashes will at least hold more.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid I was expecting more. Your ability to compact your trash is determined completely by your own strength. When it starts to get full the bag slips off the corners. All in all, I am not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Eshiqi

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk, Terrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Bought the trash can and the pin that hold the crushing mechanism together popped out. Every other day, I had to search for it and put it back in, but it never held. Tried contacting Joseph & Joseph customer service, but they keep saying that they won't do anything, despite the fact that it is still under warranty. Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I got this trash can at the end of May and it’s the beginning of September and the foot step to open the garbage can is broken. I can only open the lid 1/2 way, which makes it difficult to use. I was happy with the trash can, but my husband wasn’t a fan, now it’s broken, I’m not going to hear the end of it. He felt it was a waste of money and now I have to agree. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: mackecon

customer_reviews.title: Expensive overpriced trash can - not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is nice...while it lasts. Concept is nice, but it doesn't hold up. Our compacting handle hinge popped apart within 5 months of use. Now it's just an overpriced stainless steel kitchen trash can with expensive liners. Save your money. Buy something cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Mrseche

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: This product did not meet our expectations. The bag does not stay in place when you go to compact the trash. We have tried several ways to attach it and it never stays on. I feel like we paid a lot for just a regular trash can and won't use the compactor feature much.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonna

customer_reviews.title: Not really compactor.
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice doesnt compact like advertised, most trash just pops right back up. You would have to be very selective as to what trash goes in to achieve results like shown in video.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Osenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Overrated and Overpriced I try it to late to return
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is very overrated and overpriced. The compactor does not work as described and was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ncr

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Nice can, but after having it. You could just push the trash down with your hand.
customer_reviews.author: carteralford

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The bags don't want to stay in place, and changing the bag is a chore in itself...waste of money...
customer_reviews.author: MamaD

customer_reviews.title: This is not the newest version of this product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my best friend. She hadn't used it for a month and it broke! She called the mfg'er and got the needed parts but was also told there's a newer, better product. So, probably don't waste your money. This is a pricey item obviously made cheaply.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids haven't broke it yet.
customer_reviews.text: Even when I use there trash bags, they stay in place all the time. But otherwise I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Best decision for a trash container in the kitchen. I did not have space for a electric trash compactor. Next best thing.
customer_reviews.author: collie burnett

customer_reviews.title: Works, but seems to be resold
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but has a small dent and a weird smell like might have been used, returned and repackaged and sold again. For the price, I would expect pristine condition.
customer_reviews.author: Knem

customer_reviews.title: Product will break dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought in December already broken for this kind of money should not have broken in 6 months. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell bauer

customer_reviews.title: 3rd review
customer_reviews.text: Updating my review. We have been using it for several days. Worked well, bag began to come loose after it started to get heavy. I just ordered the Joseph compose container to put food items into so the garbage can will not smell and I can use one bag longer. Will see how this works. Will rdit this review later Updating the last review. Giving it 5 stars, works as described. Bags are staying in place. Taking trash out about once a week. Bags are sturdy and not ripping.. I am using the compost container which is working well. Now need to set up a compose outside and we should be recycling. all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Love my coffee

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL BIG TRASH.
customer_reviews.text: HOPEFULLY THIS HELP MY GARBAGE PROBLEMS;TOO MUCH GARBAGE AROUND MY HOME. AND KNOW WILL ENJOY IT IN MY NEW HOME WHEN I MOVE THIS MONTH. THANKS FOR UR AWESOME SPEEDING SERVICES;RECOMMEND IT.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELJUDE

customer_reviews.title: Good concept and design.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I liked the idea of using less plastic with out trash. The compacting handle is a great idea. The box does recommend using specific compacter bags. I am currently using my preexisting regular trash bags and they work well, even when compacting. The only feedback I would say could use improvement is the liner clasping mechanism. When the trash bag becomes too heavy with contents, I have noticed that the edges slip out of the rubberized plastic frame that holds in it. But again, I AM using regular trash bags at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Darksydr

customer_reviews.title: it will be better because the barrel is too big to move
customer_reviews.text: The trash can can be packed a lot, but if there is a wheel at the bottom, it will be better because the barrel is too big to move.
customer_reviews.author: Ye Bo

product_meta.title: Joseph Joseph 30030 Intelligent Waste Titan Trash Can Compactor, 8 gallon / 30 liter, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Size:8 gallon/30 liter| Color:Stainless SteelTitan is no ordinary trash unit. It features a patented, hygienic compaction system that enables it to reduce trash volume by 66% after compaction. Because Titan compacts your waste, it doesn’t need to be emptied as often, which in turn reduces the amount of liners you use and the how often you need to take out the trash.

Titan features a replaceable carbon odor filter for any unpleasant smells and a fingerprint-proof stainless-steel coating. 

Titan is hygienic and mess-free. The unique design ensures only the inside of the plastic bag touches the trash while compacting, leaving you with clean hands and a clean bin. 

Titan is built to last. Its compaction system and foot pedal have been tested over 100,000 times and are engineered to withstand many years of service. We’re so confident in Titan’s enduring quality that we guarantee it for 10 years against manufacturing defects. 

Titan has an anti-tear design that won’t stretch or pinch the trash bag. We carry extra-strong, IW4 custom-fit liners for added peace of mind. It’s also compatible with standard plastic trash bags. A handy lid-stay feature ensures liner changes are quick and hassle-free, and it also includes a handle on the reverse to make moving easy. 

Dimensions of Titan unit with lid closed (inches): 15.6 L x 13.4 W x 27 H 

Box Contains 
(1) Titan trash compactor, (3) IW4 General waste liners, (1) Odor filter, (1) Instruction booklet
feature_bullets: Reduce trash volume by 66% after compaction. 8 gallons (30L) in size, 24 gallons (90L) in capacity when compacted.
Take out trash less often and use fewer liners, saving you time and money
Odor control - An integrated odor filter compartment inside the lid holds replaceable carbon filters
Hygienic and mess-free - Only the inside of the trash bag touches the trash while compacting, leaving you with clean hands and a clean trash can

Won't tear your liners - Titan's anti-tear design won't stretch or pinch the liner. It's compatible with standard plastic liners but extra-strong IW4 custom-fit liners are also available for added peace of mind
Built to last - Titan's compaction system and foot pedal have been tested over 100,000 times to ensure they withstand many years of service. Includes a 10-year guarantee.
This allows it to hold up to three times more than a similar-sized household bin which means you empty your bin less often and use fewer liners.
